# metabase_database (Data Source)

A Metabase database.

This data source can be useful to find the Metabase ID of a database based on the database name.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# This finds a database using its ID.
# At least one attribute must be set, but they are all optional.
data "metabase_database" "my" {
  id = 1
}

# This finds a database using its Name.
data "metabase_database" "my" {
  Name = "my-database"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) The ID of the database. If specified, the `name` should not be specified.
- `name` (String) The name of the database. If specified, the `id` should not be specified.
